column1: I had to sign in multiple times.
I had to wait a long time to join.
I heard an echo in the meeting.
I heard extra noise or distorted speech.
I noticed a gap between responses.
I could not connect to the camera.
I could not start my video.
The video and audio were out of sync.
I could not view shared content.
Others could not view content I was sharing.
Shared content was not in sync with presenter.
